focus_tree = {
	id = united_states_focus
 	country = { base = 0 modifier = { add = 20 original_tag = USA } }
	continuous_focus_position = { x = 1700 y = 0 }


	# Economy tree
	focus = {
		id = USA_focus_ending_clintonomics
		icon = USA_clintonomics
		allow_branch = { date < 2005.1.1 }
		x = -13
		y = 8
		cost = 3.6

		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_POLITICAL }
		completion_reward = {
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_focus_ending_clintonomics"
			add_political_power = 75
			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_domestic_policies_tooltip
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.02 }
			USA_change_domestic_political_power_change = yes
			USA_change_domestic_drift_defense_change = yes

			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_blank_space_tooltip
			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_american_tax_code_tooltip
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.02 }
			USA_change_tax_code_corporate_tax_collection_efficiency_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.01 }
			USA_change_tax_code_civilian_tax_collection_efficiency_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.07 }
			USA_change_tax_code_military_tax_collection_efficiency_change = yes
			USA_change_tax_code_dockyard_tax_collection_efficiency_change = yes
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 100
		}
	}

	focus = {
		id = USA_focus_2008_democrats
		icon = USA_democratic_party
		allow_branch = { date < 2013.1.1 }
		x = -3
		y = 0
		relative_position_id = USA_focus_2004_urbanization
		cost = 0
		available = { always = no }
		bypass = {
			date > 2009.1.20
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = USA_focus_2008_republicans
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
  				tooltip = has_liberalism_government_TT

  				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
			}
		}

		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_POLITICAL }

			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_focus_2008_democrats"
		}

			base = 50
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				factor = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				has_global_flag = USA_DEMOCRAT_PATH
				factor = 1000
			}
		}
	}

					modify_treasury_effect = yes

	###Pro Establishment Path (left)
	focus = {
		id = USA_more_opinion_pieces

	focus = {

		x = 3

				has_completed_focus = USA_healing_the_wounds
			}
		}
		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_POLITICAL }
		completion_reward = {
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_scars_from_the_forever_war"
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = us_war_on_drugs }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = us_war_on_drugs
					add_idea = us_war_on_drugs_two
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = us_war_on_drugs_two
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 25
		}
	}

		}
		will_lead_to_war_with = CAN
		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_FOREIGN_POLICY }
		completion_reward = {
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_fascist_the_final_chapter"

			add_political_power = -500

			create_wargoal = {
				target = CAN
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { base = 1 }
	}

	focus = {
		id = USA_red_junta_seizes_power
		icon = Generic_Militant_Socialism
		x = 6
		y = 55
		cost = 6.5

				tooltip = has_conserv_reactionary_government_TT

			}

		}

		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_POLITICAL }

			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_red_junta_seizes_power"
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = communism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			clear_array = ruling_party
			clear_array = gov_coalition_array
			add_to_array = { ruling_party = 6 } #The Commissariat Corps
			recalculate_party = yes
			set_ruling_leader = yes
			set_leader = yes
			set_variable = { current_term = 1 }

			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_domestic_policies_tooltip
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_drift_defense_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = -0.07 }
			USA_change_domestic_monthly_pop_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.02 }

			USA_change_domestic_offensive_foreign_influence_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_communist_drift_change = yes

	### The American Trotskyist Seize Power Tree#####

	focus = {
		id = USA_american_trotskist_seize_power
		icon = generic_one_party
		x = -4
		y = 55
		cost = 6.5
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_anarchist_communism_government_TT
				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 5 }
			}
			has_country_flag = USA_the_socialist_workers_party_seize_power
		}
		allow_branch = { has_completed_focus = USA_electoral_rainbow }
		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_POLITICAL }
		completion_reward = {
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_american_trotskist_seize_power"
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = communism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			clear_array = ruling_party
			clear_array = gov_coalition_array
			add_to_array = { ruling_party = 7 } #World Workers Party "Trotsky Socialists"
			recalculate_party = yes
			set_ruling_leader = yes
			set_leader = yes
			set_variable = { current_term = 1 }

			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_blank_space_tooltip
			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_domestic_policies_tooltip
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.10 }
			USA_change_domestic_drift_defense_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = -0.15 }
			USA_change_domestic_monthly_pop_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = -0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_foreign_influence_defense_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.01 }
			USA_change_domestic_offensive_foreign_influence_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_communist_drift_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = -0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_democratic_drift_change = yes
			USA_change_domestic_nationalist_drift_change = yes
			USA_change_domestic_neutrality_drift_change = yes

			set_temp_variable = { party_index = 7 }
			set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_increase = 0.45 }
			set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.45 }
			add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = { base = 1 }
	}

			}

		}

		completion_reward = {
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_american_anarchist_society_collectivizes_victory"
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = communism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			clear_array = ruling_party
			clear_array = gov_coalition_array
			add_to_array = { ruling_party = 4 } #Anarchist Association"
			recalculate_party = yes
			set_ruling_leader = yes
			set_leader = yes
			set_variable = { current_term = 1 }

			custom_effect_tooltip = USA_domestic_policies_tooltip
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.07 }
			USA_change_domestic_drift_defense_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_foreign_influence_defense_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = -0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_offensive_foreign_influence_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_communist_drift_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = -0.05 }
			USA_change_domestic_democratic_drift_change = yes

#	id = <focus id>

#	cost = <number>

#		<trigger>
#	}

#	x = <position>
#	y = <position>
#	relative_position_id = <previous focus>
#	offset = {
#		x = <position>
#		y = <position>
#		trigger = {
#			<trigger>
#		}
#	}
#
#	prerequisite = {
#		focus = <focus id>
#	}
#
#	mutually_exclusive = {
#		focus = <focus id>
#	}
#
#	available = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	bypass = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	historical_ai = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	cancel = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	available_if_capitulated = <yes/no>
#	cancel_if_invalid = <yes/no>
#	continue_if_invalid = <yes/no>
#	will_lead_to_war_with = <tag>
#	search_filters = { <focus filters, separated by spaces if multiple> }
#

#		<command>
#	}

#		<effect>
#	}

#		<effect>
